results.category: 複雜查詢（WHERE + GROUP BY + ORDER BY）
results.generated_sql:
SELECT img01, SUM(img10) AS total_quantity
FROM img_file
WHERE img10 >= 100
GROUP BY img01
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 5

result.sql_query:
SELECT img01, SUM(img10) AS total_quantity
FROM img_file
WHERE img10 >= 100
GROUP BY img01
ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
LIMIT 5
result.explanation:
將自然語言查詢「查詢庫存量≥100 的料號，按料號分組加總庫存，再按總量由高到低排序取前 5 筆。」轉換為 SQL: SELECT img01, SUM(img10) AS total_quantity
FROM img_file
WHERE img10 >= 100
GROUP BY img01
ORDER BY ...

LIMIT 5;
